storyInfo: Layton, the boss of a gang in Vite City, goes to Chiave to get his car fixed. He gives the three guys there a herculean task: repair a smashed-up luxury vehicle in the shortest time possible.

attributes.text: Somewhere over the rainbow, fowlbeasts fly ♪
Why then, oh, why can't I ♪
Away above the cars and the noisy rooftops ♪

attributes.content: I'll have someone send over my car in a bit. You fix her up as quick as you can, got it?
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Yessir!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: And you two—Aosta, Broca, keep an eye on this madman.
attributes.name: Layton
Aosta
attributes.content: By 'keep an eye on'...

attributes.name: Aosta
attributes.content: You mean...?
Did you really think I wouldn't know? Some of my men already informed me.
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: 'Chiave fixed my car, but he turned the dashboard into a pinball machine!'
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: 'Chiave turned my sound system into external speakers! That's right—now everyone can hear what I'm playing inside the car! They could even hear every word of my phone call with my wife!'
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: In other words, don't let him make any modifications. I want her as good as new, and only that!
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: If there's even a single thing wrong, mark my words—I'll have the lady bury the lot of you, along with this entire garage. You got that through your thick skulls?
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Loud and clear, Boss.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: But, uh, who's 'the lady'? Don't think you've mentioned her before.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: The car, dumbass! The car is my lady!
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Should've known someone like you would never understand the depth of the feelings between a man and his car.
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Especially when she's led me through life and death alike, charging into danger for my sake...
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Uhh, okay, I get it.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Like hell you do, coglione!
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: In any case, when I come pick her up, there better not be a scratch on her—
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: I want to see her in perfect condition!
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Signor Layton, would you care to stay for a while?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: I'll pass.
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Why would I subject myself to sitting in the same room as that madman, when I have two capable guys to do it for me?
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Alright, I think you've made your position abundantly clear by now, Boss.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Since you're so determined to cozy up to Chiave, you should be figuring out how to fix that head of his instead of wasting time with me. Or you might catch some of the crazy.
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Aosta, Broca, we're gonna make a huge name for ourselves! We're about to fix up the only luxury car in all of Vite City!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: ...Do you think there's an ulterior motive for this?
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: You're overthinking it. Layton just needs someone trusty to fix up his car.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: He was ambushed a few days ago, and it got riddled with holes.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Still, you never see this kind of top-of-the-line luxury car in Siracusa. Its exceptional bulletproofing is what saved his life.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: But... why give the job to us?
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Because Chiave is, without a doubt, the most skilled mechanic in the city.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Hmph. Praise me all you want, Aosta, I'm not letting you take it out on a joyride.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: You're not letting me? Since when did the car belong to you?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Broca, go grab everything on this list of parts for me. If you make it back in half an hour, I might consider letting you take it out for a spin.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Let me drive and we're even.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Chiave, you'd better not get any itchy fingers after you finish fixing it up.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: The moment you take that car out onto the streets, someone's gonna snitch to Layton and our garage is gonna be flattened within an hour.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Fine, whatever.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Appreciate it.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Though, if Layton's gonna be the only one driving it, nobody else'll get to appreciate my mods. And that's a damn shame.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: You're still planning on messing with it?!
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: You said it yourself—'you never see this kind of top-of-the-line luxury car in Siracusa'!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: An ultra-light chassis, a crazy-powerful engine, a perfectly aerodynamic design...
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I've got a hunch that only this car here can fulfill my dream! This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: ...So what exactly are you planning to do to it?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Why spoil the surprise?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: When Layton comes back to pick up the car, all your jaws are gonna be—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Whoa, back already, Broca?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: C'mon, let's see those hot rod parts you got there—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Mmmmmrfgh!!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: The hell, Aosta?! What are you covering my mouth for!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I brought over the boss's car.
attributes.name: Layton's Henchman

attributes.content: Okay, we'll take it into the garage right away.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: One more thing, Chiave. The boss wanted me to remind you of something.
attributes.name: Layton's Henchman

attributes.content: Sure, sure. What is it?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: If he finds even the slightest trace of modifications to his car, he's gonna plaster you into the wall of your basement.
attributes.name: Layton's Henchman

attributes.content: Uhh, anything else?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Also, I'll be staying here the next few days. He asked me to keep an eye on your repairs the entire time, just in case you get any funny ideas.
attributes.name: Layton's Henchman

attributes.content: About that...
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Oh, Broca, great timing.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Here, show our friend to the garage's living quarters. He's going to be staying with us for a few days.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: This is Signor Layton's confidant. Just... try to keep your old habits in check and don't lay a finger on him.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Hurting him won't do us a bit of good.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: What old habits are you—
attributes.name: Layton's Henchman

attributes.content: Wait, what are you up to?
attributes.name: Layton's Henchman

attributes.content: Showing you around.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Y-You... don't mess with me! I was sent here by Signor Layton! If you even touch me—
attributes.name: Layton's Henchman

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: S-Stop dragging me! I can walk on my own!
attributes.name: Layton's Henchman

attributes.content: (Wipes off sweat)
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: So, you heard the man. If you mess with Layton's car, he's gonna plaster you into the basement wall.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: So just fix it nice and proper, and don't even think about souping it up. I'll owe you one after this, okay?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Why would I need a favor from you though?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: ...And who else would you want one from? Layton? For modding his car when he specifically told you not to?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: You betcha.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Ah, I get it now.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: I'll go tell him you got brain damage from the oil fumes and won't be able to work again for half a year.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: W-Wait! Aosta, listen to me!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: ...What now?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: I'm serious here!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Yes, I get it, you're serious about becoming one with the wall.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Just hear me out! I might never get another chance to work on a car like this! It really is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: The two of you can skip town before I finish, and I'll deal with Layton myself. Then you can come back after I win him over! There's no way he won't be blown away by my creativity!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: And if he really is a complete pleb with no taste, and still decides to stick me in the wall after seeing my magnum opus, I'll accept my fate!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I'm telling you, this is the greatest work I could ever hope to achieve!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: You're my bro, bro. Don't make me resent you for the rest of my life!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: (Sighs)
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Not like I could stop you anyway, when you're this excited.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Just remember that Layton's got eyes on us. You should play it safe during the day, and wait for him to go to sleep before doing any mods. Broca and I will do our best to cover for you.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: So how about it? Not too shabby, right?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I gotta admit, you got an awful lot done in just a few days.
attributes.name: Layton's Henchman

attributes.content: And... it doesn't look like you've added anything weird either.
attributes.name: Layton's Henchman

attributes.content: Mind if I get inside and take a look?
attributes.name: Layton's Henchman

attributes.content: Chiave?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: No problem, go for it.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: The seat... upholstery... dashboard... all check out...
attributes.name: Layton's Henchman

attributes.content: Now how about the speakers?
attributes.name: Layton's Henchman

attributes.content: ...Chiave, what the hell's up with this play button? There's no red button on the picture the boss gave me!
attributes.name: Layton's Henchman

attributes.content: That's, umm...
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Uhh...
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I already warned you—if you've got the nerve to screw around with the boss's car, I ain't gonna play nice!
attributes.name: Layton's Henchman

attributes.content: I'm gonna push it, so if you've got a good excuse, let's hear it before things get messy.
attributes.name: Layton's Henchman

attributes.content: Go ahead.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Layton's Henchman

attributes.content: The Famiglia will find you no matter where you go, oh oh ♪
No matter if you're fast, no matter if you're slow, oh oh ♪
So you just replaced the normal play button on the stereo with a red one?
attributes.name: Layton's Henchman

attributes.content: Basically.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: (Shakes his head)
attributes.name: Layton's Henchman

attributes.content: You and the boss got the same exact taste...
attributes.name: Layton's Henchman

attributes.content: Anyway, it's getting late. The boss will come around tomorrow morning to pick up the car. I'm heading off for now.
attributes.name: Layton's Henchman

attributes.content: Chiave, about your mod...
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Don't worry about it.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: You're sure you can keep it hidden? That guy could tell right away that something was wrong with the play button.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Hidden? Who said anything about hiding it?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: That guy had no idea what he was looking at anyway. I only put up with hiding it at all 'cause you told me to.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: But since Layton's the one who bought the car in the first place, I'm sure he'll understand the heart and soul I've put into it!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: ...So you're saying you won't be able to hide it from him.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: C'mon, don't put it like that.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: It's more like, he'll understand the greatness of my work at a single glance!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: (Sighs deeply)
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Deep breaths, Aosta, deep breaths.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Alright, Chiave. I need you to tell me—what kind of 'surprise' do you have in mind?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Didn't we agree to keep it a secret?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I need to know so I can start thinking of ways to minimize Layton's anger.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Just let it be, man. You'll spoil tomorrow's grand reveal—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: If you don't tell me now, we're all done for when he comes over to give us our surprise!
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: If it's really that big of a deal, get over here and I'll whisper it into your ear.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Broca, you don't care as much as Aosta does, right?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Broca, grab all our valuables, and find the fastest car you can get your hands on.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Are we making a run for it?
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: The sooner the better!
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: And you, Chiave, stop standing there like an idiot! Pack up anything important to you so we can get the hell out of Vite City before Layton catches on!
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I thought I told you I wouldn't be leaving? I'm sure Layton will understand me.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Like hell he'd—
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Damnit, Chiave. Even if he does 'understand' you, that won't make him any less pissed! If you don't want to spend the rest of your very short life inside that wall, grab your stuff and run!
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Broca and I might get a pass, but you're seriously gonna get yourself killed!
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Then you two leave without me.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: What about you?!
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: I can't.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: If I run away now, nobody will ever know of my work. I can't accept that.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Besides, this is the fastest car we can get our hands on. And Layton might have a nasty streak, but he's never done us wrong so far.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I'm sure he'd rather get a pleasant surprise from my mod than pass out from high blood pressure when he finds his beloved car stolen.
attributes.name: Chiave
Aosta
attributes.content: You—

attributes.name: Aosta
attributes.content: Hey, Broca!
Tie Chiave up and drag him away if you have to! I've got the rope!
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Didn't you just tell him to go pack his stuff? Want me to call him back for you?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Let's... think this through again.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: (Snores rhythmically)
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Aosta, it's ten o'clock.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: It sure is. Amazing how this bastard can sleep so soundly.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Not only is he not afraid of Layton, he's also not worried about us dragging him off in his sleep.
attributes.name: Aosta
Aosta
attributes.content: If we can't come up with something before sunrise—

attributes.name: Aosta
attributes.content: Wait, hold on a sec...
attributes.joined: If we can't come up with something before sunrise—Wait, hold on a sec...

attributes.content: I've got it! I know just what to do!
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Broca, once he wakes up, tell him we'll do everything as planned.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Also tell him to dial that surprise up to twelve... No, to twenty!
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Boss, I'm bringing the car out!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Chiave, you truly are the best mechanic in town. I sure came to the right guy, at least when it comes to fixing her up.
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Once I get back to the office, I'll figure out how much I owe you.
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Don't worry about the money.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Just let me take her for a spin before I hand you back the keys. That's all the payment I need.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: You're not going to charge me anything? You sure?
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: (Nods)
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Fantastic. If taking her out of the garage wasn't enough for you, you can drive her back to my office for me.
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: By the way, I don't see Aosta today.
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Me neither.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I heard he drove away from your place in a hurry last night. A little while later, Broca left as well.
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Tsk, tsk. You could use better friends.
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: But at least they're smart.
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Layton's gaze fixes on the red button placed between them.
Maybe you can fool my idiot henchman, but you can't pull a fast one on me.
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Mind explaining why the play button on my stereo is red now, and why there's a ring of non-slip lines around it?
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: About that...
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Because it's a knob!
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: A damn knob!
attributes.name: Layton
Layton
attributes.content: So tell me, what the hell is this new knob for? Because it sure ain't a volume dial, is it? That just wouldn't be you, Chiave!

attributes.name: Layton
attributes.content: Am I right?
attributes.joined: So tell me, what the hell is this new knob for? Because it sure ain't a volume dial, is it? That just wouldn't be you, Chiave!Am I right?

attributes.content: Boss, instead of explaining it, it's better to see it in action.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: So you admit it?
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: When my man reported back to me, I thought maybe you had a change of heart. But looks like old habits truly die hard.
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Drive us back to my office first. I'll deal with you later.
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: And don't try anything smart. You'd especially better not touch that knob. I will be keeping an eye on you.
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: But then we won't have any music to listen to.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I'd be more worried about what you'll put on your suicide note, kid!
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Make a right up ahead.
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Boss, your car really is something else. Otherwise, I wouldn't have—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: It's too late to try buttering me up now.
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: What the hell?!
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Madonna santa... Again with this shit?!
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Chiave, don't tell me you sent these guys—
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Pezzo di merda! I just fixed up this car! Are they insane?!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: (Muttering) Guess it wasn't you after all...
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: If I didn't have better things to do with my life, I'd run all of you stronzi over right this instant!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Watch out for those oil drums over there!
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: I see 'em!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: (Pats the steering wheel)
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Haha, get a taste of your own medicine!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Don't let your guard down! They still have cars on our tail!
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: I know! I see 'em nice and clear!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Not too far now! We're almost there!
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Boss, before that, I have a favor to ask of you.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Save it for later.
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: No, I need your word now.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: If you're talking about messing with my car, we'll settle the score... line by line!
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: That's not what I'm talking about!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Then what is it?
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Before you stick me inside that wall, I want you to round these guys up and bring 'em before me!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I'm gonna make 'em cry and apologize to your lady!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: 'My lady'?
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Yes, the car!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I worked on her day and night for an entire week!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Wait...
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Wait, what the hell?!
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: They're seriously trying to block the intersection with a truck?!
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Slow down, you idiot! We're gonna ram straight into it! If you keep accelerating, we're gonna crash!
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: However, Chiave's hands clench tightly onto the steering wheel, his foot not easing off the accelerator in the slightest.
They draw closer and closer to the truck.
In a panic, Layton tries to grab the steering wheel from Chiave, while Chiave reaches for the stereo dial.
What are you—
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: And turns the knob all the way.
The Famiglia will find you no matter where you go, oh oh ♪
No matter if you're fast, no matter if you're slow, oh oh ♪
You're still in the mood... for...
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Music?
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: As the music picks up, the roar of the car's engine quickly overwhelms the pop song coming from the luxury car's speakers.
At the same time, Layton feels a jolt he'd never experienced before, the sudden acceleration pressing him deathly-tight into his seat.

People outside see a short hang glider protrude from both sides of the car, and a plume of black smoke shoots from the underside as the sunroof flies open to reveal a pair of drones whose wingspans expand to unimaginable size.
The whole car shudders before taking to the air.

attributes.text: It soars over the truck, over the noisy streets, over the ambushers, over the awestruck onlookers, even over an entire low-rise block.
Other than fowlbeasts, this is the first time something bigger than a crossbow bolt or a satchel of explosives has flown across the sky above Vite City.
A mob boss, a mechanic, and a flying car belching black smoke.

attributes.content: Flame and fury's roar over the cry in the morn, oh oh ♪
You're fine for a while but you start to lose control~oh-oh-oh-oh-oh~
So are these the kinda songs you like, Boss?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I cut to one that suits the occasion better. Whaddya think?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Layton's face turns pale. He remains frozen in his seat, motionless.
Elena, my name is Elena ♪
I'm just a Lupo ♪
Just like any other Lupo ♪
Actually, this one's a bit too vulgar.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Nessun dorma! Nessun dorma ♪
Tu pure, o, principessa ♪
Nella tua fredda stanza ♪
Guardi le stelle che tremano d'amore ♪
I guess this one's passable.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: ...You.
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: What was that, Boss?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: You... You...
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: (Teeth chattering)
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Just... you wait.
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Mm, sure.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Though, I never expected these modded drones to be able to carry us this far—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I'd say they lasted about ten seconds longer than I planned for.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: We're about to begin our descent, Boss.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: ...Descent?
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: What goes up, must come down.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: What did you say?!
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Don't worry. I'll do my best to stick the landing.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: The two drones begin to fall one after another, and the black smoke coming from the bottom of the car gradually dissipates.
It begins to dive downward, accompanied by tear-jerking music and Layton's heart-wrenching screams.
We made it, Boss!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: W-W-W-We did?
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: I already told you, there was nothing to worry about! I spent most of my time making sure the shock absorbers would be able to handle the landing. It was all under control!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Under.. control...
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: ...What about her?
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Her?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Layton ignores Chiave and inserts the key into the ignition, turning it with shaking hands.
She...
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: She's left you for good.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Chiave!!!
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Listen here! I'm gonna have you buried in that wall faster than you can—
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Signor Layton! Signor Layton! I'm from the Vite City Post! Was this test flight your idea or Signor Chiave's?
attributes.name: Reporter A

attributes.content: Excuse me, did you purchase this luxury vehicle specifically for the test?
attributes.name: Reporter B

attributes.content: How did you feel before it began? What did you experience while you were soaring through the air?
attributes.name: Reporter C

attributes.content: We noticed that someone was attacking your car shortly before the test flight. Do you know why?
attributes.name: Reporter D
Layton
attributes.content: Huh?
Of course this was your idea. Isn't that right?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Huh? What?
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: As for the car... Signor Layton reluctantly provided it for the sake of this great experiment.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Right?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Ah, yeah...
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: In the end, you entrusted the car to Chiave to see your dreams brought into reality, am I right?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: (Takes several deep breaths)
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Exactly!
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: And as for how I felt... There are no words to describe the emotions. Just imagine looking down on the streets of Vite City accompanied by music from the finest singers!
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: The people who ambushed me were just a bunch of lowlifes who can't even lift their eyes in appreciation of the starry skies. Not worth wasting your breath on...
attributes.name: Layton

attributes.content: Signor Chiave, what are your thoughts as the man who actually made this test flight possible?
attributes.name: Reporter A

attributes.content: It was freakin' amazing! I—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Sorry.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Aosta, this is all your fault. All the papers are dedicating their front pages to Layton's nonsense, and the only thing I've got to show for it is a black eye from Broca.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: You can't say that. It was Layton's car, after all.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: In the end, you completed 'his' plan and made him one of Vite City's greatest innovators. It's the first time he's appeared in the news outside of the crime section. He'd be crazy to lay a finger on you at this point.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: And if we're talking strictly business, you wrecked his car, but also saved his life. If you ask me, that pretty much breaks even.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Of course, it sure was convenient for the ambushers to show up right then.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: When I visited that reporter that night, I was only planning on embarrassing him. But I never expected the mods you made to save his life...
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: I still don't like how things ended up.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: There might be more luxury cars out there, but there's only one brain like mine...
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Agreed.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Hm? Broca, are you actually complimenting me?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Chiave, let me tell you something that'll cheer you up—I could hear the sound of his miserable howling along with the music, all the way from the front door of his office.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Hahahaha!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: By the way, there's one more thing that didn't make the news.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: You've already earned yourself a new nickname in Vite City, though you'll have to share it with Layton—
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Come on in!
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Excuse me, is this the repair shop of Chiave the Skyfarer?
attributes.name: Excited Civilian

attributes.content: I wanna soup up my car too!
attributes.name: Excited Civilian
